flawed_nl_solution:
He used 1/4 of his tank because 1 - (2/3) = 1/4
He used 3 gallons of gas because 12 x (1/4) = <<12*1/4=3>>3
He drove 20 miles because 2 x 10 = <<2*10=20>>20
He gets 20/3 miles per gallon because 20 / 3 = <<20/3=20/3>>20/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1/3, not 1/4. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
